headline.main: Follow-Up on the News; Waiting for 'A Party' Endangered Disease The Tiniest Refusnik

docs.abstract: Follow-up article on Harold Brodkey's novel A Party of Animals that was to be published 3 years ago by Farrar, Straus & Giroux; Brodkey's manuscript is still unpublished and now is with Alfred A Knopf; Farrar, Straus & Giroux pres Roger Straus comments (S)
